name: Undercroft (itch)
description:
The year is 20,013. The world is under the control of a madly powerful pizza restaurant chain, and Pizzaman needs to escape his imprisonment at the restaurant to reunite with his family! Defeat as many pizza assassins as you can and try to last as long as possible. Move with WASD or the Arrow Keys, then once you Right Click on an enemy to join with them and get acess to their gun, you can shoot with the Left Click.

Credits: 

Lgro#3806 - Programming 

SkeleguyJohn#1261 and Mrs Obama (CFS)#5857 - Graphical Design and Lore - skeleguyjohn's youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCk6D1qBZTtGcA9rrvsuGc_Q

 Dobrakawanimat#8341 - Music and Brainstorming - You can check him out at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfGu13LBlwnNWGzUZv-dHWw and https://soundcloud.com/dobrakawanimat
